        Murderville

        Subscribe
        • Apple Podcasts
        • Google Podcasts
        • iHeartRadio
        • Radio Public
        • Stitcher
        • RSS

        Murderville, an investigative podcast hosted by senior Intercept reporters Liliana Segura and Jordan Smith, examines the systemic failures that lead to wrongful convictions.

        Murderville, Texas: Season Two takes Segura and Smith to the death penalty capital of the country, where they investigate a disturbing crime, a startling confession, and a story that doesn’t add up.

        Murderville, Georgia: In Season One, Smith and Segura uncover what happens when law enforcement authorities lock up their first suspect, leaving another man free to kill.
